quotes: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Small steps every day add up to big results
Done is better than perfect.
You've made it through 100% of your worst days.
Keep going. You’re closer than you think.
Discipline is remembering what you want.
Dream big. Start small. Act now. – Robin Sharma
You don’t have to be extreme, just consistent
Every day is a chance to get a little better
Progress, not perfection
It's okay to take things slowly
You are allowed to rest without guilt.
Be kind to yourself — you're learning.
You're not behind. You're on your own timeline
Focus on what you can control; let go of what you can't.
You are enough, exactly as you are
Pause. Breathe. Then continue.
A single step forward is still progress.
Don't compare your chapter one to someone else's chapter twenty
Peace over perfection.
One task at a time.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started. - Mark Twain
Make it happen. Shock everyone
You don't need motivation — you need momentum.
Focus on the next right thing.
Action cures fear.
Start small. Stay steady. Build momentum.
Your future self will thank you.
A year from now, you'll wish you'd started today.
You can do hard things
